pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Chemical-resistant gloves made of barrier laminate, butyl rubber ≥14 mils, nitrile rubber ≥14 mils, neoprene rubber ≥14 mils, polyvinyl chloride (PVC) ≥14 mils, or Viton ≥14 mils; Shoes plus socks

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes substantial but temporary eye irritation. Harmful if swallowed or absorbed through skin. Do not get in eyes, on skin or on clothing. Avoid contact with skin. Wear appropriate protective eye wear (goggles, face shield or safety glasses). Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco, or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15 to 20 minutes; Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye; Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice; Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow; DO NOT induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison control center or doctor; DO NOT give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing; Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15 to 20 minutes; Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air; If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth, if possible; Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment.

Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a broadcast soil surface spray at planting in a sufficient amount of water for thorough coverage. If alfalfa seed was previously treated with mefenoxam or metalaxyl as a seed dressing, use the 0.25 pt. / A rate at planting. If inter-seeding alfalfa into existing stands for renovation, apply 0.25 pt. / A as a broadcast spray at planting.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 125.5 fl. oz. / A (4 lb AI/A) per year
Application_Info.max_applications_per_season: 2 applications per year at reduced rates
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply to soil beneath the tree canopy as a broadcast, band or irrigation spray in sufficient water for thorough coverage in the spring before growth begins and in the fall after harvest but before the ground freezes.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 181.9 fl. oz. / A (5.8 lb AI/A) per year
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a broadcast or banded soil spray in spring before plant growth begins. Use sufficient water for thorough coverage and move fungicide into the root zone by rainfall or irrigation.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 19.8 fl. oz. / A (0.63 lb AI/A) per year
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a broadcast or banded soil spray in sufficient water or liquid fertilizer at planting. Move product into the seed zone after planting with 0.5 to 1 inch sprinkler irrigation.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 23.2 fl. oz. / A (0.74 lb AI/A) per year
Application_Info.application_Method: Make foliar applications beginning at flowering and repeat at 14-day intervals. Tank mix with chlorothalonil or mancozeb when conditions favor foliar disease.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 7.9 fl. oz. / A (0.25 lb AI/A) per year
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a broadcast surface spray at planting or incorporate into the top 2 inches of soil. For banded applications, a 7-inch band is advised.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 47.1 fl. oz. / A (1.5 lb AI/A) per year
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply in-furrow or as a band over the row at planting in water or liquid fertilizer. For in-furrow, position spray into the furrow over seed before covering.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 62.8 fl. oz. / A (2.0 lb AI/A) per year
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a broadcast or banded soil spray at planting in water or liquid fertilizer. For banded applications, a 7-inch band is advised.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 47.1 fl. oz. / A (1.5 lb AI/A) per year
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply in banded sprays or through drip irrigation in sufficient water to move fungicide into the root zone. Make up to 3 applications per crop per year.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 112.9 fl. oz. / A (3.6 lb AI/A) per year
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a band or broadcast soil spray at planting. For banded, use an 18-inch band over the row. Make one additional application if needed.
